meanings.definition: Resembling a pig in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The messy eater had a piglike appetite, finishing his meal in seconds.
meanings.sent2: The farm had a piglike smell, reminding visitors of the animals nearby.
meanings.sent3: The piglike snorting noises coming from the movie theater made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her piglike rooting through the pile of clothes revealed the missing sock.
meanings.sent5: The piglike grunts echoed through the forest, signaling the presence of wild boars.

meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics similar to those of a pig.
meanings.sent1: The greedy child's piglike behavior at the buffet surprised his parents.
meanings.sent2: The messy room showed a piglike disregard for cleanliness.
meanings.sent3: The piglike stubbornness of the mule made it impossible to move.
meanings.sent4: His piglike curiosity led him to explore every nook and cranny of the old house.
meanings.sent5: The piglike squeals of excitement filled the air as the children played in the mud.
